Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Spectrophotometric tube reader capable of kinetic reading at 405 nm and minus the background at 495 nm
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Fungitell STAT colorimetric assay for qualitative detection of (1→3)-β-D-glucan in serum as an aid in diagnosing invasive fungal infection.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of (1→3)-β-D-glucan in the serum of patients with symptoms of or risk factors for invasive fungal infection, as an aid in diagnosis of deep-seated mycoses and fungemias, used with other diagnostic procedures.
